title: remove the bin/pend script.  It is not needed
Each pendulum should have a different color.
close_reason: Already implemented in both web and GUI - colors array defined at core.cljs:19 and gui.clj:19

title: Entry point for desktop GUI.  Create a bin/pend sheel script to run the desktop app.
Design an pleasant color pallet and UX structure for the UIs.  The GUI and Web UI's should look almost exactly the same.

The UI has two states, Running and Paused.  In Paused mode, the physics engine is off and the pendulums remain whereevery they were last located. This allows the user to modify the pendulums.  They can be repositioned, removed, or new pendulums added.  Each pendulum can be selected by clicking on it.  It's angle can be modified by dragging it.
close_reason: Implemented paused mode with pendulum selection and angle adjustment via drag. Both HumbleUI and web UIs support clicking to select bobs and dragging to adjust angles when simulation is paused.

title: make the web interface paths relative to the project root so that it can be opened with the command
close_reason: Fixed web interface paths - goog/base.js path corrected to cljs/out/goog/base.js. Interface now opens correctly from project root.
